items.sentence: Tom was feeling peckish, so he rang room service and ordered a hamburger.
Mary's biggest disappointment in life is not being able to have children.
Tom is a creature of habit and does pretty much the same thing every day.
Tom went to school even though his mother told him he was too sick to go.
Please don't forget to put stamps on the letters that I gave you to mail.
If that accident had happened in the city, it would've caused a disaster.
I don't think that you need to tell Tom what Mary said she's going to do.
You seem to be prejudiced against ideas that come from foreign countries.
The boy pretended he could read, but he was holding the book upside down.
The mayor thought that he should investigate the decline in tax revenues.
